abstract: Christopher L. Hayes of The Nation magazine will host a weekend morning show for MSNBC beginning in September.
snippet: Christopher L. Hayes of The Nation magazine will host a weekend morning show for MSNBC beginning in September.
lead_paragraph: Updated | 8:07 p.m. | Christopher L. Hayes of The Nation magazine will host a weekend morning show for MSNBC beginning in September, the channel said Monday.

headline.main: Hayes to Host MSNBC’s Weekend Morning Show
